In an intimate setting designed to relax and rejuvenate your senses, every moment at Amara Sanctuary is a unique memory. From the sunlight streaming through your shutters, the free-roaming peacocks, to the warmth of our hospitality, each moment will create a lasting impression. And it is all within minutes from Singapore’s central business and shopping districts, Universal Studios Singapore® and Sentosa’s attractions.

description:
This uniquely dynamic dining experience is a culmination of street food and food truck favourites from the region and rest of the world. By showcasing the best of the classics, modern and culinary crossovers, we have curated over 200 dishes hailing from all over the world across a band of 12 unique traders, diners are truly spoilt for choice. On top of our huge array of food choices, each and everyone of them are presented differently with unique kiosk presentation and live cooking.

Pasarbella Suntec measures 8000 sqft of beautifully crafted space embraced by our brilliantly lit neon signs and graffiti-ed walls. We also have an amazing frontage facing the renowned Fountain of Wealth.

Additionally, we have 1000 sqft of island dining area which venue seekers can rent on its own which is strategically situated in the mall which is among the areas with the highest human traffic, perfect for commercial usage. It provides additional seating option during peak periods and doubles as a perfect space for a smaller events like workshops, casual team meetings and cocktail parties.

Pasarbella is not an event space for the light-hearted. We love to work with bold and unique brands that challenge normality with their own interpretation. Our past clients includes Hyundai and Mercedes. *Weekday Dinner slot*  (6pm -10pm)
Set-up starts at 5pm
Corporate events of minimum 100 pax 
(Dinner & Dance, Networking session, Launch Party)

(Optional)
Events set-up
- 3 x speakers (with stands)
- 2 x wireless mic
- 3 x 40" TV with stands
- 1 x live feed
- 1 x Stage 16ft x 8ft
- 1 x sound engineer for duration of event

Please drop us an inquiry for updated additional cost.
facilities: Air conditioning, Bar tab, Full bar, Microphone, Projector, Stage, Wifi, Pens, Papers, Chairs, Tables, TV Screen, Sound System, DJ console, Event Staff, Tea, Coffee, White Board, Cleaner

description:
TONITO serves Latin American cuisine from
places like Mexico, Peru, Cuba and Argentina in an easy-going oasis for
everyone, anytime of the week, and aims to showcase the different flavours of
Latin America in a family-friendly setting. Be exposed to the different
cuisines and be wowed by a wide selection of Mexican “Tacos and Quesadillas”,
Peruvian “Anticuchos”, Latin American sandwiches like Argentinian “Choripanes”
and Venezuelan ” Pepitos”.  




With a small but cosy setting, TONITO is
able to house up to 70 pax seated – perfect for luncheons or even private
celebrations as guests savour Latino favorites like Tacos, Quesadillas, and a
range of delectable sandwiches, with the world’s tallest indoor waterfall
vortex as the backdrop. You might even want to switch things up and transform
the space for cocktail and networking sessions, with a total standing capacity
of up to 100 pax; the terrace is well-poised for such events!
facilities: Air conditioning, Bring your own stuff, Wifi, Chairs, Tables, Event Staff, Tea, Coffee

description:
Located at Marina Bay
Financial Tower 3, OLA Cocina Del Mar is a Spanish restaurant and bar serving
traditional Spanish dishes with a tinge of Mediterranean flare, using only the
freshest of seasonal produce. Helmed by chef owner Daniel Chavez, these dishes
are reflective of his guidance under the late Spanish Catalan avant-garde chef
Santi Santamaria and learning experiences in different kitchens and cooking
techniques all around the world.  Guests can definitely
feel at home here at OLA in a cosy and casual setting, coupled with genuine
hospitality. The beautiful and vintage interiors allow for a wide variety of
setup configurations, with a flexible seating capacity of 120 pax and standing
of 150 pax. There are also 2 private dining rooms with a capacity of 10pax and
14pax each; of which it can also be combined to form a large private space.
What an ideal location for corporate functions and private celebrations!  Featured  MICHELIN
GUIDE SINGAPORE 2019,




 Tatler Dining
Best Restaurants 2019/2020, Tripadvisor Certificate of Excellence 2016 - 2018

title: Luna
description:
Luna @ Buona Vista is a minimalist event space beautifully furnished with a mixture of sofa and table seating that gives off a relaxing and cozy vibe. 


The venue is well-furnished with a suite of amenities to cater to a wide spectrum of events ranging from corporate events such as seminars, workshops and product launches to recreational events like team-bonding and Dinner & Dance. Host your private party such as birthday parties here for an unforgettable experience! 

The cafe is within short walking distance from  Buona Vista MRT (5mins) and One North (8mins), there are 180 indoor parking lots which make it easily accessible for all your guests.

description:
Cloud9 is an event space that has various amenities to cater to different events. These events can range from solemnisations, proposals, birthdays, workshops, corporate events, team-building, cohesions; the possibilities are endless. Most of our equipment are portable and easily movable. You can re-arrange them in any way you deem fit to tailor the space according to your needs.

title: Here.SG
description:
Here.SG @ Farrer Park is a creative event space that is nothing like you have ever seen, designed to create an unforgettable experience for everybody. With intricate design features such as an indoor glasshouse cafe, 3D-art feature walls and fully-customizable mood lighting, there are plenty of IG-worthy spots so start snapping away! Rock a mini-concert on the elevated stage, dive right into the ball pit or shoot some hoops to relieve some childhood fun! 

The unique venue will definitely set your event apart from the rest! The venue is well-furnished with a suite of amenities to cater to a wide spectrum of events ranging from corporate events such as business meetings, seminars, workshops and product launches to recreational events like team-bonding, cohesion, award ceremonies, celebrations and the list goes on. Located on the fringe of CBD within short walking distance from Farrer Park MRT, there are ample parking facilities which make it easily accessible for all your guests.

description: King and the Pawn is a one-of-a-kind board game cafe and event space on Purvis Street, featuring over 300 board games, our favourite comfort foods with a playful twist, beer on tap, and locally-roasted coffee.  This space is designed to feel like a cosy living room, with lots of lounge and sofa seating. One of the walls can be used as a screen for a projector.  Within the space, there are also more than 300 board games available for free play, ranging from rowdy party games and bluffing games for large groups to brain-burning strategy games, as well as classics like Jenga and Monopoly. Seating available for 25 pax, can fit up to 30 people including standing room.

title: Relish | Sapphire - Unique Venue Room
description: Welcome to RELISH, the home of passionate, fresh, and delicious dishes. Located in Ascott Raffles place, our restaurant is ready to satisfy your hunger and thirst in true style. Every aspect of your experience, from the food to the décor, has been a journey to create a restaurant close to our hearts.It is the culmination of 11 years of food, laughter and excellent wine. Our restaurant is perfect for meetings, family gathering or intimate dinners. Join in the tradition with our family in our modern eatery where you and your friends can indulge in what Relish does  great food and great company.As of 2020, We are proud to have 1 Relish and 2 Cali Outlets in Singapore. The 1st Cali Outlet is located at Rochester, while the 2nd Cali Outlet is located at Changi and the 3rd Relish outlet located at Ascott Raffles Place. All of them boast the same flavour and style but with a different atmosphere, Relish has cosy and elegant indoor dining with 2 private dining area, Rochester hosts a great indoor and alfresco area, while Changi has a more relaxed atmosphere with great outdoor sitting and a long bar.

title: Happen.SG
description:
Winner of Venuerific's Most Popular Venue 2019 – Happen.SG @ Jalan Besar is a creative space that is designed for work and play under one roof which will create an unforgettable experience for you and your guests. The 1,700 sqft space is spacious and is centrally located on the fringe of CBD. Housed within a restored shophouse with double high pitched-roof ceiling and classic timber shophouse windows which allows natural lighting to flood the space during the day, it gives a sense of airiness and spaciousness. The space is also designed with accents of yellow which brings a refreshing and modern look.

Happen is equipped with a suite of equipment and facilities is able to cater any occasion ranging from corporate events such as business meetings, networking, seminars, workshops and product launches to recreational events like team-bonding, cohesion, award & appreciation ceremonies, birthday celebrations and many more.

title: OTC Cafe
description:
Tucked away in a tranquil corner on Level 3 of the National Library, OTC Cafe is the perfect venue for your next private event, birthday bash, baby shower, corporate workshop, seminar, movie night and more!. Whether it is for an intimate group gathering of 10-20pax or for a corporate function that needs to host more than 200pax, OTC Cafe is able to accommodate to your needs! OTC Cafe understands that every event is different and they will be happy to discuss and tailor a suitable package for you. 

OTC café also offers catering services for those who are holding seminars or meetings within the National Library. They also provide food catering for lunch, dinner or cocktail reception, venue booking, corporate packages, birthday packages, available foyer space, and function rooms and free wifi

title: LDF 老地方 @ Kallang Riverside Park
description:
LDF 老地方 @ Kallang Riverside Park is an rustic looking and unique event space. With a spacious 2,200sq space, this event venue is perfect for hosting huge parties! Furthermore, guests get to experience complete privacy with their own private lift. Being surrounded by greenery and water, guests of the Usual Place SG get to feel close to nature, a unique, reminiscing, off the beaten track vibe.

Along with the exotic locations, this venue provides its guests fun and exciting amenities, including Nintendo Switch, arcade machine, bar counter, board games, giant jenga, pool table and a foosball table. The multiple amenities makes this an entertainment haven for you and your guests, perfect for hosting parties, intimate get togethers, team-bonding activities, client meetings, and many more events!

title: Thirsty4balls
description:
A one-of-a-kind billiard cafe & bar that is uniquely designed to showcase a fun, hip and trendy vibe. Thirsty4balls is able to offer you an extremely unique and multi-usage venue with a trendy yet comfortable ambience to promote interest, enjoyment and comfort for any social and meeting appointments. All the  billiard tables can be converted to dining and board meeting tables. They have billiard games, multiple board games and a ball-pit Jacuzzi for social events to keep everyone entertained, as well as a projector screen for meeting groups or if you just want to show your personal montage on a special day. 

Thirsty4balls is specially equipped to host a variety of events, from small family gatherings of just 10 persons in the sectioned bar space, to huge events like birthday parties, company team building and even an informal company meeting appointment.

Launched in November 2018, KOMYUNITI Bar & Restaurant is located on Level 10 of YOTEL, right at the heart of Orchard Road. Following the unmistakable tradition of quality and comfort, KOMYUNITI Bar & Restaurant is the central hub, the beating heart of the hotel, a multi-functional space designed to create a sense of community whether for work or play. It is where life happens and is shared. It is where people connect within a smartly-designed space.Helmed by Head Chef Benny Lim and award-winning mixologist, As’ad (better known as Utt), the bar and restaurant brings guests on a tantalising journey combining the most eclectic of Eastern and Western flavours, along with a refreshing line of quirky hito-inspired cocktails that are minimalistic in style yet sophisticated to taste. The menu features dishes and drinks that are all about fun and creativity, ensuring that a visit to KOMYUNITI will always be memorable. Large ceilings with a beautiful pool view, which can be blocked with blinds and curtains

description:
Occupying the almost 200-year-old building that was Singapore's first Parliament House, The Arts House has been offering its audiences a broad range of arts and culture programmes. It also plays an active role in the Singapore creative scene. Once a space where Singapore’s most important decisions were made, the former Parliamentary Chamber is the highlight of The Arts House, and is now a popular venue for musical performances, stage productions and conferences. 

Other venue options include a black box theatre, galleries, multi-purpose rooms, and a screening room, featuring a digital cinema projector and 7.1 Dolby surround sound. The different rooms available at the Art House makes it easier for hosts to pick a perfect venue regardless if it is a birthday party or a fashion show, The Art House is able to cater to those needs. 

10% off rental rates for Venuerific users
- Promo  ARTS10OFF

10% off event booking for SC staff
- Promotion is not available with other deals
- Promo  SCBVRDEAL

10% off event booking for JP Morgan staff
- Promotion is not available with other deals
- Promo  JPMVRDEAL Situated in the heart of The Arts House, the Chamber was the place where Members of the Singapore Parliament gathered to debate policies. The Chamber is furnished with customised furniture from London, complete with original upholstery from 1954. 

A castle motif from the coat of arms used during the time Singapore was a Crown Colony can still be seen on some seats in the main chamber. Today, the versatile space accommodates up to 200 people and is used for recitals, performances and conferences. With a central aisle, the intimate space also serves as a great venue for fashion shows and wedding events.
facilities: Air conditioning, Microphone, Private room, Projector, Stage, Wifi, Chairs, Tables, Sound System, Tech Support

Neoclassical architectural details are seen in the Corinthian columns, and long Palladian windows fill the room with natural light. This adaptable space is used for performances and corporate functions that range from press conferences, product launches to receptions. 

There is ample standing room for up to 120 people for cocktail events, 60 seated in a round table setting and 80 in a theatre style layout.

title: The Loft
description:
The Loft @ Cathay Cineplexes is a flexible and modern venue that is suitable for all types of events. The event space is complete with event amenities such as TV screen for presentation, speakers, tables, chairs and VIP lounge area. The Loft is located in the heart of Orchard, whilst having a high ceiling and lots of natural lights and beautiful view of the city. 


All types of events will be suitable such as birthday parties, baby showers, product launches, offsite meetings and office gatherings.


Site recce is recommended to have a better understanding of the area layout. The Loft can fit up to 60 to 100 pax comfortably for a standing reception, 30 to 50 pax for a seat-down lunch / dinner event and 20 to 30 pax for offsite meeting.

title: Urban Tavern
description:
Urban Tavern is the leading unique event space provider in Singapore. Urban Tavern venues serve a wide spectrum of events, ranging from corporate workshops to birthday parties. At Urban Tavern, we pledge to provide creative event spaces, a flexible and simple booking process, and top-rated customer service.

Our rates are as 
First hour - $280
Next 8 hours - $100 per hour
Subsequently - $50 per hour

Extensions will be charged at the prevailing hourly booking rates.
Extensions on the event day will be charged at $150 per hour.
Prices above are inclusive of cleaning and credit card charges.
Prices are subject to change without prior notice.
No security deposit is required.

Cancellations with greater than 60 days notice will be given 90 per cent refund
Cancellations with 30 to 60 days notice will be given 50 per cent refund.
Cancellations within 30 days will not be given any refund

Customers with paid reservations may change to another venue at no additional cost.
Bookings may only be postponed if request is made with greater than 60 days notice.
Booking dates may be brought forward at no additional cost.

Urban Tavern Pte Ltd reserves the right to take legal action on any non-payment.
Renter is liable for up to, and equal to the full cost of damaged item.
Renter will be responsible for the actions of all invited guests.

title: 222 Arts Club
description: 222 Arts Club is Singapore’s newest multi-dimensional space and located within walking distance from Bras Basah. This 5,000 square-foot space offers a unique environment for brands, producers and agencies masses of creative, flexible and inspiring setups. Day and night, it can accommodate for larger events or smaller groups for an intimate setting. It is the ultimate blank canvas for exclusive private events, conferences, art exhibitions, concerts, product launches, photoshoots and filming.

description:
Zouk - The largest outlet within the complex, spans across two stories, with its very own overlooking balcony. The outlet boasts a neo-industrial aesthetic and design modernity that is intended to amplify the cutting-edge technologies and sounds. The key feature is the specially customized light "spaceship" which is capable of exhibiting an infinite possibility of light displays, guaranteed to wow audiences. 

Phuture - The futuristic approach to music is reflected in its decor, reinforcing the room's aerodynamic design. Playful furniture, funky LED backed bars, and an inviting circular dance floor adds movement and is perfect for product launches, giveaways, and celebrations up to 250 guests.

Capital - Sized at 640sqm and capable of accommodating up to 550 guests, Capital luxuriates a lounge-like atmosphere of modern cool and elegance with four zones – comprising an island bar, whisky bar, whisky room, and a plush seating area encircling the dancefloor. Marketed as an upscale and premium venue, Capital has played host to some of the most luxurious fashion brands such as Zalora, Cortina, Lancome to name a few. 

RedTail Bar - Dynamic craft cocktails with the finest and freshest ingredients, great wines and craft beers, as well as plating up fun sharing bites perfect to drink with, Red Tail is the perfect place to host up to 80 guests for a cocktail reception or even just a game of beer pong!

Zouk is the place to have fun and let down your hair after a day of hard work. Host a blood-pumping, mind-numbing night at Zouk party for you and your friends!! A new, one-of-a-kind experience from Zouk that takes nightlife to the open sea onboard Dream Cruises' new ships - Genting Dream (Singapore) & World Dream (Hong Kong)

The WKND, a 3D2N Zouk Staycation - In collaboration with Dream Cruises

Zouk At Sea’s The WKND was birthed with the goal of educating and changing perceptions and mindset s on the concept of cruising among millennials. That cruising isn’t boring.
Through its experiences, it aims to also build a community of free-spirits and build a bridge to connect millennials across different cultures and lifestyles. description:
Get away from the stuffy meeting room, and bring your events and meetings to new heights at Faber Peak Singapore, where the vibrant venues are a breath of fresh air and the views are invigorating! The only top-of-hill event location in Singapore with a bird's eye view of the harbour, Sentosa and the city skyline. With 2 event venues-with-a-view & 2 restaurants, Faber Peak Singapore is a perfect venue for company events, weddings and celebrations!

Situated in Mount Faber Park and great views, Faber Peak is only 15 minutes from the city by car. Choose from the optional transport service or arrive by Singapore Cable Car. 

 At the highest point of Faber Peak, the Private Dining Room offers a truly intimate experience surrounded by panoramic sea views and a vast garden landscape. 

Encased with glass walls and framed by graceful hiba wood arcs, this crystalline alcove is a perfect observatory for you to feel on top of the world. 

Perfect for intimate weddings, VIP dinners & Meetings
facilities: Air conditioning, Microphone, Projector, Smoking area, Chairs, Tables, TV Screen, Sound System, Tech Support, Event Staff

description:
Get away from the stuffy meeting room, and bring your events and meetings to new heights at Faber Peak Singapore, where the vibrant venues are a breath of fresh air and the views are invigorating! The only top-of-hill event location in Singapore with a bird's eye view of the harbour, Sentosa and the city skyline. With 2 event venues-with-a-view & 2 restaurants, Faber Peak Singapore is a perfect venue for company events, weddings and celebrations!

Situated in Mount Faber Park and great views, Faber Peak is only 15 minutes from the city by car. Choose from the optional transport service or arrive by Singapore Cable Car. 

 The name “Arbora” is derived from the Latin word "Arbor", which refers to trees. 

Perched atop the lush greenery of Mount Faber Park, Arbora offers the best of both worlds with an alfresco area  to enjoy the sea breeze and an indoor dining room (Arbora Bistro) for those who like the comfort of the air condition. Both spaces allow you to enjoy the panoramic views of the hillside rainforest.

description:
Get away from the stuffy meeting room, and bring your events and meetings to new heights at Faber Peak Singapore, where the vibrant venues are a breath of fresh air and the views are invigorating! The only top-of-hill event location in Singapore with a bird's eye view of the harbour, Sentosa and the city skyline. With 2 event venues-with-a-view & 2 restaurants, Faber Peak Singapore is a perfect venue for company events, weddings and celebrations!

Situated in Mount Faber Park and great views, Faber Peak is only 15 minutes from the city by car. Choose from the optional transport service or arrive by Singapore Cable Car. 

 Set against a unique backdrop of running cable car line, the harbour and a magnificent view of nature, The Ballroom and its floor-to-ceiling glass windows present a vista that is bound to leave guests in awe.
facilities: Air conditioning, Microphone, Projector, Stage, Pens, Chairs, Tables, TV Screen, Tech Support, Event Staff, White Board

title: Grill Ninety Nine
description: Grill Ninety Nine in Singapore is a Halal restaurant and events venue that is home to some of the city’s tastiest Halal Western dishes. Located on Arab Street in Bugis, Grill Ninety Nine prides itself on its eclectic menu, and the restaurant’s talented kitchen team are well known for whipping up some sensational plates of food. Dining parties of all sizes are welcome at Grill Ninety Nine, and the vibrant atmosphere at this venue is yet another reason why you should visit. With Bugis MRT stop just a short stroll away, getting to Grill Ninety Nine shouldn’t be a problem; perfect for Halal events with a private event space located on Level 2.Instagram.com/grillninetynineGrillninetynine.com.sgFacebook.com/grillninetynine142arabstreet

title: Keppel Club
description:
Coupled with the cool sea breeze, the Berlayer Terrace by Keppel Club is fast becoming a hot spot for events such as weddings, birthday celebrations, and seminars. The open-air area can also be enclosed with air-conditioning to hold various functions.

Numerous large-scale club events have been held at Keppel Hall, which can accommodate up to 50 tables for a sit-down dinner

The food embodies the training Executive Chef, Lee Boon Seng went through in Michelin-starred establishments.The interiors encapsulate a funky yet modern aesthetic, showing off a flexible seating capacity of 190 pax and standing of 300 pax. The Spot Singapore also has a Private Dining Room that can sit up to 20 pax. The various spaces within the The Spot are functionally interwoven so that diners can engage in different activities on its own or in combination such as Wine and Whisky tastings, Course meals, Canapes, Alfresco bar snacks etc.

title: BLU JAZ CAFE
description:
Piedra Negra & Blu jaz have 4 different vibrant rooms to offer which comes with attached bar , washroom and sound system. We do not charge any rental but only a minimum spending of $1,500++ for the day, to include all food and drinks ordered. We will also require a $500 non-refundable deposit to secure your booking and once the min. spend is reached, this can be used to offset from your total bill. *Our Buffet menu we can make better as per your requirement. As we can provide you with food from our Western, Mexican & Mediterranean Restaurant as well which include halal/Non-halal Food.  Also for Sound Related things we can provide you Mic, Projector, Screen and I-pad music on the house. But if you need a DJ or Band you need to hire your own. we can assist you for Setup, Sound Check & Equipment's(depend on availability) Complimentary.

True to their word, "We believe in, to work for you and assure your memorable experience with us." BLU JAZ CAFE provides an idyllic setting for guests to have an unforgettable party!

title: Cali @ Rochester
location: Buona Vista, Holland Village, One North
description:
This exotic venue is a conveniently located inside the Park Avenue Hotel. Cali @ Rochester provides their guest with a sample banquet menus that are specially designed to create a gastronomical dining experience. Guests are able to state their dietary requirements and the cafe will do their very best to meet your special requirements. Additionally, Cali @ Rochester has an extensive wine list and a full bar and handcrafted cocktails, specially chosen to pair with food.

Create your special moments with Cali @ Rochester for a magical event - Birthday party, Christmas party, Halloween party, Baby Shower, Corporate party, etc and make your event a wonderfully memorable day.

title: Superyacht Megaway 128
description:
The Megaway 128 is a luxury superyacht that offers four decks for lounging, relaxing and all-round unwinding.

This classic superyacht combines immaculate contemporary interiors with ample alfresco areas. A generously-sized flybridge offering remarkable panoramic views makes for the perfect backdrop to corporate and private events. 

Designed and built in Singapore.  Enquire now about the Megaway 128 experience --- a unique and memorable way to celebrate life's myriad occasions.

Rates from SGD$6,100++ for a dockside charter experience for 80 guests at Raffles Marina. 

Please contact us for more information on rates and packages.
promos: Get 10% worth off on booking from venuerific. Inquire now for more details.

title: The Joyden Hall
description:
The Joyden Hall is a creative space that provides the opportunity for limitless event possibilities and the materialization of innovative ideas. With retractable tiered seats, mobile stage platforms and professional theatre equipment, a variety of space configurations can be easily achieved to effectively meet and suit all your event needs.

The Joyden Hall also comes with an indoor and outdoor area. The outdoor area presents the guests a romantic area with a beautiful view of the city, the indoor area consists of a spacious ballroom and reception area and is intricately furnished with grand and luxurious amenities. This gorgeous event space is suitable for hosting events such as company dinner and dance, product launch, product exhibitions, fashion show, video and photoshoot.

title: Wakanui Grill Dining Singapore | Private Dining Room
description:
WAKANUI Grill Dining Singapore is known for its premium-quality dry-aged Ocean Beef and succulent WAKANUI Spring Lamb from New Zealand, grilled on Binchotan charcoal. 

The restaurant made its name in Tokyo, Japan and the WAKANUI franchise in Singapore is the only overseas outlet operated by 1855 F&B Pte. Ltd. 

With a total seating capacity of 86 pax and standing capacity of 120 pax, WAKANUI overlooks the lush central gardens and towering office buildings of Marina One, offering a welcoming respite from the bustle of city life. WAKANUI also has three private dining rooms, each sitting up to 8 pax. Two of which can be combined to form one large private dining room. Perfect for a business meeting!

Awards

One Star by Singapore's Top Restaurants (2018/2019) awarded by Wine & Dine Magazine 

Singapore's Top Restaurants (2018/2019) awarded by Singapore Tatler Magazine
facilities: Air conditioning, Private room, Projector, Wifi, Chairs, Tables, Tea, Coffee

title: Catamaran Kucinta
description:
Launched in 2018, Kucinta marks the third vessel constructed in Singapore by local boat builder Megaway, the team behind the 128-feet superyacht Megaway128. This 45-footer takes its name from the iconic Singapore cat Kucinta Twin hulls create a much more capacious space for lounging onboard for guests and minimizes rocking motion and greater stability. Perfect for guests who are prone to sea-sickness and young guests. 

Kucinta is equipped with a kitchenette and audio-visual amenities, including a Bluetooth-enabled entertainment system and touchscreen karaoke system. She is currently based at Raffles Marina on the Western tip of Singapore. Be it whether it is a corporate party, Christmas party, Birthday party or just a get-together, guests will surely have a memorable time on the Kucinta.

title: Jewel Changi Airport | Cloud9 Piazza
description:
Set
against the backdrop of spectacular landscaping and with a majestic view of the
HSBC Rain Vortex, this destination offers one-of-a-kind venues that provide
memorable experiences for different occasions. From larger scale corporate gala dinners and conferences, lifestyle brand launches, networking
cocktail sessions and Family Day events … to cosy festive and birthday
celebrations, corporate team-building activities, workplan retreats and board meetings,
there is a wide variety of spaces to cater to all your event and meeting needs! Located on the top level of Jewel and surrounded by a beautiful park and unique play attractions, Cloud9 Piazza offers guests an unparalleled view of the HSBC Rain Vortex in a refreshing alfresco setting in air-conditioned comfort. With an area of about 1,000 sqm, this is an ideal space for corporate and community functions, as well as consumer lifestyle and experiential events.

description:
With elements of Asian cuisine complementing our specialities, Yassin Kampung Seafood strives to capture the essence of our authentic Singaporean cuisine through our succulent delights, serving as a call back the origins of Singaporean culture.
A restaurant immersed in the rich history of Singapore’s past, Yassin Kampung Seafood takes you back to simpler times with its nostalgic flair, utilizing elements in its decor traditionally found in the early kampung days of Singapore as it instils a cosy and familiar feeling for families to dine in.

With our rustic atap roofs and vintage wooden theme, our restaurant prides on capturing the “gotong royong” and “kampong spirit” of earlier generations as our staff works faithfully and selflessly to bring you only the best we can offer.

First established in 2002, Yassin Kampung Seafood has served as a popular destination for locals in the northern region of Singapore as well as travellers passing through the Causeway for it is a family-oriented environment and affordable prices. Suitable  corporate events, weddings, birthday parties, anniversaries & family events Up to 200 pax sitting capacity, but can be up to 2,000 pax for Malay wedding (in wave)

description:
With elements of Asian cuisine complementing our specialities, Yassin Kampung Seafood strives to capture the essence of our authentic Singaporean cuisine through our succulent delights, serving as a call back the origins of Singaporean culture.
A restaurant immersed in the rich history of Singapore’s past, Yassin Kampung Seafood takes you back to simpler times with its nostalgic flair, utilizing elements in its decor traditionally found in the early kampung days of Singapore as it instils a cosy and familiar feeling for families to dine in.

With our rustic atap roofs and vintage wooden theme, our restaurant prides on capturing the “gotong royong” and “kampong spirit” of earlier generations as our staff works faithfully and selflessly to bring you only the best we can offer.

First established in 2002, Yassin Kampung Seafood has served as a popular destination for locals in the northern region of Singapore as well as travellers passing through the Causeway for it is a family-oriented environment and affordable prices. Suitable  corporate events, weddings, birthday parties, anniversaries & family events Suitable for solemnization, birthday, corporate dinners, halal office parties.
facilities: Air conditioning, Microphone, Smoking area, Chairs, Tables, Sound System, Tea, Coffee

title: Hard Rock Cafe Singapore | Red Carpet Room - Event Space
description:
Hard Rock Cafe Singapore, sporting a new sleek contemporary look, adorned a refreshed collection of memorabilia, and an all-American food favourites! Singapore’s flagship outlet opened in February 1990 in the trendy Orchard Road area and has been rocking ever since, hosting events from the Asian Television Awards to The New Paper’s World Cup Finals’ screening. Choose  

1. The Red Carpet Room, a cozy room on the second floor with floor-to-ceiling windows. Best for meetings, seminars, solemnizations or private dinners. 2. The Mezzanine, an open balcony layout with a bar area, great for networking or corporate meet & greet. The Main Floor - complete with a dance floor and a stage. Ideal for larger parties and events such as concerts, album launches and dinner and dance.
facilities: Air conditioning, Full bar, Microphone, Private room, Projector, Wifi, Chairs, Tables, TV Screen, Sound System

title: Chun Tsubaki
description:
Combining the concepts of Danish 'Hygge' and Japanese 'Wabi-Sabi', our studio combines the natural beauty of organic aesthetics and bliss in simplicity. Huge windows allow for the warm and natural daylight into the venue. A unique natural-light studio complete with photography backdrops, a social kitchen, and a dining/lounge area, space is perfect for both work and play!

The well furnished, minimalistic room is suited for all sorts of events, from social gatherings, wedding, baptismal, baby shower, photoshoot and video shoot. This event venue space is the ultimate sanctuary for the some making some memorable memories with friends and family.

title: Gallery Space at Ngee Ann City
description: An elegant diamond gallery at Ngee Ann City, lit with chandelier lights and spotlights, equipped with TV connected to laptop, speaker, carpeted, 2 separate rooms with 2-seater sofa and table for refreshment. Events hosted before including dialogues with entrepreneurs, diamond talks, fashion show, closed-door diamond shopping, social dance event, wine tasting event etc.

title: Piedra Negra
description:
Piedra Negra & Blu jaz have 4 different vibrant  rooms to offer which comes with attached bar , washroom and sound system.

We do not charge any rental but only a minimum spending of $1,500++ for the day, to include all food and drinks ordered. We will also require a $500 non-refundable deposit to secure your booking and once the min. spend is reached, this can be used to offset from your total bill.

*Our Buffet menu we can make better as per your requirement. As we can provide you with food from our Western, Mexican & Mediterranean Restaurant as well which include halal/Non-halal Food.

 Also for Sound Related things we can provide you  Mic, Projector, Screen and I-pad music on the house. But if you need a DJ or Band you need to hire your own. we can assist you for Setup, Sound Check & Equipment's(depend on availability) Complimentary.

title: Tribe Restaurant (The Arts House at Old Parliament)
description: Located by the historic Singapore River at The Arts House and surrounded by historical buildings, Tribe Restaurant boasts of its charming getaway spot in the heart of the city.  An elegant atmosphere will make one’s experience relaxed and comfortable.  The restaurant is just a few minutes away from City Hall/Clarke Quay MRT StationInspired by flavors from around the world, you will be spoilt for choice with the impressive yet value-for-money selection of International delights available.  Tribe is a social enterprise restaurant under the Bliss Group which aims to provide training and employment to disadvantaged beneficiaries. We provide both space and food, making it perfect for Corporate event, team bonding, as well as family and friends get-together for birthdays, weddings and solemnizations. We offer completely customized and personalized menus for any event. Your choices are limited only by your imagination! We will work with you in order to provide a catering experience that is all about you; your vision, your tastes and your budget. Our professionalism and dedication ensure that our Clients have stress free, smooth and successful event experiences that are second to none

title: Drama Centre | Drama Centre Theatre

price.pricing: There are various Rental Rate categories (Arts Non-Profit, Arts General and Private Hire) pending on various conditions. A minimum block of 4 hours booking is required. Venue rental rates are NOT inclusive of incidental charges/consumables and manpower charges

description:
Formerly located at Fort Canning Park on the site originally for the Singapore Council for Adult Education, Drama Centre was the key platform for local companies starting out in the early 1980s, staging Singapore plays like Lao Jiu, Army Daze and Mail Order Brides.The location of Drama Centre in the National Library building creates an unprecedented synergy with the arts facilities, attractions, institutions and the commercial sector to enliven the surrounding area.Drama Centre adds to Singapore’s performing arts spaces with its 615-seat proscenium theatre. It also offers an intimate 120-seater black box, VIP lounge and function rooms to meet the diverse demands of today’s arts events – from mid-sized theatrical presentations, to intimate performances, talks and exhibitions.Drama Centre, a National Arts Council arts venue, is managed by Arts House Ltd. The Drama Centre Theatre is a performing arts space for mid-sized productions with its 615-seat proscenium theatre. The Theatre is equipped with state-of-the-art lighting, rigging and sound systems. There is an orchestra pit on a lift that forms a front stage extension if activated. With plush seats and good acoustics, audiences are assured of a comfortable and enjoyable experience.

The function area and its VIP lounge with exclusive facilities such as bar, pantry and restrooms cater for seminars, meetings and private functions as well. A cafe and box office located at the foyer are additional means by which the Drama Centre aims to assure patrons of the highest standards of service.
facilities: Air conditioning, Microphone, Stage, Wifi, Chairs, Tables, Sound System, Tech Support, Event Staff, Cleaner

title: SMU Event Spaces
description:
SMU is a premier university renown for its world-class research and distinguished teaching. It has now opened its ultra-modern and highly flexible spaces within the campus for events. 

The Mochtar Riady 
Equipped with state-of-the-art multimedia facilities that enables wireless network connection, dual projection and acoustic controls. The spacious adjacent foyer is suitable for receptions and networking which has been graced by world leaders. 

The SMU  
A seating capacity of up to 800 people. The Hall’s setup is adaptable for different event purposes, for seminars, conferences and world class shows.

SMU Seminar  
Customised to achieve a greater contact between the speaker and the audience. 

SMU 
Allow flexible furnishing to suit your unique layout requirements. From theatre, classroom and clusters setting, you are spoilt for choice.

title: PizzaExpress
description:
Located in Singapore’s bustling CBD, just a stone’s throw away from the Downtown MRT, PizzaExpress at Marina One is the perfect venue for any event.  

The restaurant boasts an open and airy feel, thanks to full-length glass windows, and a stunning, modern interior. We have a fantastic Bose sound system, microphone, projector and screen, a fully stocked bar and seating for over 160 people.

Treat your guests to a mouth-watering menu created by our Executive Chef. We can serve PizzaExpress favourites or a selection of specially designed event dishes; either in a buffet or à la carte style. PizzaExpress Marina One is ideal for corporate events, solemnisation/engagement receptions, birthdays and Christmas parties!

title: District 10 Bar & Grill (Suntec)
description:
Donning its new title of District 10 Bar & Grill of Suntec within Bonta Group, the small and neat 1,800 square-foot restaurant comes complete with a European Meat Showcase and Chiller for its Dry Aged Meat to cater to its Gourmet Loyalists. This meticulous dry aging procedure allows the enzymes to break down the connective tissues in the muscles, leaving behind a surprisingly higher concentration of natural flavors that consumers get to savor- the tasty and tender goodness of Dry Aged cuts.

Apart from their scrumptious menu, District 10 bar & Grill offers both outdoor and indoor seating area. The indoor seating area offers customers a classy and elegant ambiance and the outdoor seating area presents a stunning view of the city. The amazing food and view make this place an ideal place for all kinds of celebrations - birthday parties, baby showers, wedding, solemnization, etc.

title: Distrii Amphitheatre
description:
Distrii Singapore Republic Plaza is an upscale, modern, beautifully furnished event venue that is home to private offices, meeting rooms, team spaces, hot desks, and a conference/event hall. The huge glass windows allow the natural daylight to shine through, giving the room a warm and natural feel. Additionally, this event space specially designed with versatility and flexibility in mind, a host can change up the seating plan and layout to complement their event type. 
The abundance of different room styles gives hosts the freedom of choosing a particular venue that is best suited for the event type. Regardless whether it is a formal event - meetings, corporate seminar, marketing event, or informal parties - birthday parties, cocktail parties, this venue is perfect for all!

From intimate business meetings to larger scale company dinners, our experienced banquet team can transform and personalise our versatile facilities to suit your event needs.
Padang Restaurant (50-120 Sitting capacity, 80-180 Standing Capacity)
Victoria Room (Maximum 25 Sitting Capacity, 35 Standing Capacity)
Gilmour Room & Terrace (Maximum 50 Sitting Capacity, 80 Standing Capacity)
 Gilmour Room is a private indoor function room with an accompanying outdoor terrace that overlooks the Padang and offers stunning views of the CBD skyline and Marina bay Sands.
Booking of the Gilmour Room also include the Gilmour Terrace; employed separately or in tandem, they effectively cater to a myriad of events that range from corporate seminars, cocktail evenings, causal BBQs
facilities: Air conditioning, Microphone, Private room, Smoking area, Wifi, Pens, Papers, Chairs, Tables, Sound System, Tech Support, Event Staff, White Board

title: Beast & Butterflies, Level II
description: Situated in Central Singapore, Beast & Butterflies is a non-conventional event venue that can comfortably house 50 to 70 people. This one-of-a-kind event space is specially designed by Phillipe Starck. Setting itself apart from other venues, Beast & Butterflies level II is designed specifically to allow full natural daylight, which brings a warm and cozy touch to the overall feel of the venue.Further equipped with amenities like a full bar, projector/TV and microphones, this event space is fully customizable and undeniably an awesome place to host birthday parties, baby showers, and both corporate and social functions alike.

description:
Overlooking the Singapore River, this upscale, high-rise hotel is 7 km from the beaches on Sentosa island and 6 km from the Universal Studios Singapore amusement park. 

Streamlined rooms feature minibars, free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs; upgraded rooms feature marble bathrooms and/or river views. Suites add separate living rooms; luxury 1- and 2-bedroom apartments include full kitchens. Room service is available.

title: Arpanam
description:
Due to the extraordinary circumstances we find ourselves in, we have introduced enhanced measures to maintain the safety and well being of our guests. These measures 
Provision of hand sanitisers around our venue spaces for easy access
Temperature checks of all guests or event organizers and their participants in our venue
Increased cleaning / disinfecting frequency of all surfaces, in addition to before and after every event
Temperature checks twice daily of all our staff and third party vendors; contact tracing of all vendor representatives
Masks worn by all kitchen staff members in our restaurant
Use of gloves by all staff when handling food items and other perishables
Seating layouts adjusted to provide for safe distancing and to accommodate no more than 10 people at any point within our venue
We offer an intimate venue designed for diversified use, nestled in Little India. Presenting the combined experiences of an event and live performance space, with meeting rooms and workshop facilities. In addition, our space can transform to become a wellness studio for team building activities.Built around a sustainable vision and offering South Indian vegetarian cuisine from our highly acclaimed Podi & Poriyal, we also feature international vegetarian / vegan cuisines through strategic collaborations. Podi & Poriyal has a huge following already, not just for its food, but also for the unique cocktails, mocktails and craft beer that feature in its beverage program.We are a holistic venue, focused on guest experience!

title: District 10 Bar & Restaurant (UE Square)
description:
The District 10 concept exudes an uninhibited, casual and fun dining energy with its brand of authentic classic European cuisine, beers, and a small menu of local flavors to serve the growing middle class of professionals, managers, executives and business specialists. The food served focuses on simplicity using only top quality and fresh ingredients, retaining the authenticity of the dishes, while adding a modern touch. Perfecting its make of classic dishes with the use of quality ingredients and traditional cooking methods is the key by offering hearty Italian dishes that's both unique and satisfying.

The authentic nature of District 10’s food offers its guests a rejuvenating take on local food. Coupled with the amazing location of this bar and restaurant, this place is perfect for hosting events such as business luncheons, business dinners, client meetings, interviews and many more!

title: Grand Mercure Singapore Roxy
description: Our team of dedicated experts and professional staff support will provide tailor-made solutions to create the comfortable and congenial atmosphere you need for conducting your MICE (meetings, incentives, conferences and exhibitions) business or private functions. Our modern and versatile conference facilities include 10 different function rooms with soundproof partitions for corporate and private events, such as residential or non-residential seminars, workshops, product launches, cocktails or wedding banquets.

description:
The world’s top young university, NTU is named
one of the most beautiful schools in the world.  NTU has two choice
locations opened for meetings, executive trainings, seminars, workshops, conferences, celebrations and special events
bookings.
NTU at one-north is close to the heart of
Singapore, 10 minutes' drive
to Singapore’s CBD and well served by the one-north and Buona Vista MRT
Stations. Nanyang Executive
Centre (NEC) sits on main campus in west Singapore, just a short drive away
from major retail malls located at Jurong East and Singapore’s new national
garden, Jurong Lake Gardens. The campus is a bus ride away from Boon Lay and
Pioneer MRT stations. Car parking is available at both venues.
The event venues are well furnished with
amenities such as projector, screen, tables, chairs, sound system etc From
Seminar Rooms, Function Rooms and Lecture Theatres to Auditorium, both venues
offers flexible meeting and event spaces to
suit any meeting, event or celebration. Our in-house F&B provides a
selection of menus from bentos, cocktail reception, seminar catering, buffet
catering to vegetarian and healthier choice catering. For residential events, NEC
offers comfortable 170 hotel-like guest rooms. Daily rates include
complimentary breakfast, Wi-Fi and access to the Sports & Recreation
facilities such as gym, pool and running tracks.
 For enquiries, please contact
our Sales & Marketing Team for a proposal today.
facilities: Air conditioning, Microphone, Projector, Stage, Wifi, Chairs, Sound System

title: Victoria Theatre & Concert Hall | Victoria Theatre

price.pricing: There are various Rental Rates categories (Arts Non-Profit, Arts General and Private) and application of rates are subject to conditions.  A minimum of a 4-hour booking is required.  Venue rental rates are NOT inclusive of incidentals/consumables and manpower charges.

description:
First established in 1862, the Victoria Theatre & Victoria Concert Hall is one of the most recognizable landmarks in Singapore. The heritage building located in the heart of the city’s Civic District contains a 614-seat Theatre and a 673-seat Concert Hall.In 2010, the national monument underwent a four-year refurbishment to restore its neo-classical façade while getting new state-of-the-art facilities and amenities. The redevelopment also saw the addition of two smaller rooms for music, dance and theatre rehearsals.Having played a role in the country’s history for over 150 years, the Victoria Theatre & Victoria Concert Hall continues to be an exciting mid-sized platform, supporting the growth of Singapore’s arts industry.Victoria Theatre & Victoria Concert Hall is managed by Arts House Ltd. Constructed between 1855 and 1862 and originally built as a Town Hall, Victoria Theatre is the older of the two buildings that make up this performing arts venue. The Town Hall was converted into a theatre in 1908 and was renamed Victoria Theatre.

Victoria Theatre is set in a black box, offering a seating capacity of 614 and the flexibility for the formation of an extended forestage or an orchestra pit when required. When the orchestra pit is in use, the seating capacity is 536. The Theatre is wheelchair accessible in the Stalls area.

The intimate space features a curved seating plan that “hugs” the stage, bringing the audience closer to performers. Cast-iron components were taken from the old Theatre’s chairs and re-purposed into horizontal bands set across the timber walls to improve the acoustics of the space.

Adjacent to the Theatre is a suite, which can be used as a private hospitality suite or as an extension of the Theatre Main Foyer, suitable for a maximum of 10 – 15 people.
facilities: Air conditioning, Microphone, Stage, Wifi, Chairs, Tables, Sound System, Tech Support, Event Staff, Cleaner

title: Victoria Theatre & Concert Hall | Victoria Concert Hall

price.pricing: There are various Rental Rates categories (Arts Non-Profit, Arts General and Private) and application of rates are subject to conditions.  A minimum of a 4-hour booking is required.  Venue rental rates are NOT inclusive of incidentals/consumables and manpower charges.

description:
First established in 1862, the Victoria Theatre & Victoria Concert Hall is one of the most recognizable landmarks in Singapore. The heritage building located in the heart of the city’s Civic District contains a 614-seat Theatre and a 673-seat Concert Hall.In 2010, the national monument underwent a four-year refurbishment to restore its neo-classical façade while getting new state-of-the-art facilities and amenities. The redevelopment also saw the addition of two smaller rooms for music, dance and theatre rehearsals.Having played a role in the country’s history for over 150 years, the Victoria Theatre & Victoria Concert Hall continues to be an exciting mid-sized platform, supporting the growth of Singapore’s arts industry.Victoria Theatre & Victoria Concert Hall is managed by Arts House Ltd. Formerly called Victoria Memorial Hall, the Concert Hall was built between 1902 and 1905 in honor of Queen Victoria. The Memorial Hall played a significant role in Singapore’s history, serving as a makeshift hospital during World War II and as a venue for the inaugural meeting of the People’s Action Party in 1954. The Victoria Memorial Hall was renovated in the 1970s to serve as a concert hall. Today, the Victoria Concert Hall is the home of the Singapore Symphony Orchestra.

With 673 seats, the Concert Hall has retained much of its old-world charm of classical proportions and ornamentation. In the latest refurbishment, the balcony overhang on the second floor was reduced and raised to free up the volume and to enhance acoustics, simultaneously resulting in better views from all seats. A coffered ceiling has been installed to suit acoustic requirements and to harmonise with the proportions of the hall. A grand Klais pipe organ consisting of 2,012 pipes takes center stage. The Concert Hall is wheelchair accessible in the Stalls area.

Aliwal Arts Centre is a multi-disciplinary arts centre, with a strong focus on the performing arts, located within the bustling Kampong Glam district. 

A versatile range of spaces that cater to various needs – from product launches to performances, workshops to workstations. Work directly with Singapore arts groups to create unique events for team building, education or to impress clients.


Unlock 10% discount off the event venue booking when making inquiries through Venuerific. Terms & Condition apply. 
Promo  ALIWAL10OFF The Multi-Purpose Studio is 64 square metres and works as a great space for private meetings and seminars.
facilities: Air conditioning, Bring your own stuff, Microphone, Private room, Chairs, Tables

title: Cargo39
description:
Set against the panoramic backdrop of Singapore’s industrial waterfront, Cargo39’s 4000-square-foot warehouse boasts an industrial-chic interior with exposed ceiling trusses, gleaming chandeliers and concrete floors. Expansive sea views and urban artwork come together to create a one-of-a-kind, quite literally “out-of-the-box” experience at Tanjong Pagar Distripark. The sprawling space includes the Angra Wine & Spirit cellar with over 20,000 bottles and stacked barrels adding a rustic touch. At night, the marina skyline with lights from the ships and cranes against the dark ocean. Industrial minimalism meets urban luxury to inspire creativity and innovation. 

From weddings and private celebrations to corporate events, product launches, fashion shows, fundraisers and photo shoots, the possibilities are endless at Cargo39.

title: The Vending Space
description:
Welcome to the ‘The Vending Space’ – your space, your way

TVS, is the newest and most versatile space for hire for creative minds. It boasts beautiful natural light, polished concrete floors, high ceilings and vehicle access. TVS is a rare space that can quickly and easily transform, making it perfect for any event  Content Production(filming and photo shoots),Events and Activation, Creative Performances, Community Groups, Fashion Shows, Pop Up Shows, Workshops, Team Building Activity, Fitness Classes, Car Launches and Mini Exhibition.( If needed, Production and Photography equipment are available for hire and we’ve added a bonus access to our team of event specialists that can create any event you desire.

TVS, can accommodate up 120 - 150 guests and has the added advantage of a projector and dropdown screen to connect to your laptop with a Professional Complete Sound System with Wireless Microphones, Chairs and a Pool Table to wind down. Catering can be arranged too!

Centrally located just opp the ABC Market along Bukit Merah Road and a short walk from the train station. TVS, is located in the worlds first iconic ‘Car Vending Machine' building in Singapore that was recently feature on CNN, BCC, NHK Japan and over 50 other networks worldwide. Amazing!

We’d love you to explore ‘The Vending Space’.

title: Gabbar
description:
Strategically located in the heart of the hip Clarke Quay area, Gabbar, will help you experience the wonderful taste from the Indian Cuisine. We have a wide variety of appetisers such as Tandoori dishes, Mouth Watering Kebabs, late night bites and many more to tantalise your taste buds.

By effortlessly blending the indoor and outdoor areas, Gabbar becomes a synergistic space where you can enjoy great bollywood music and DJ plus some amazing performances. Whether it be at the vibrant indoor bar or the alfresco area, the ambiance always evokes a sense of being close to everything and yet away from it all.

title: Native Kitchen
description:
Located within the cosy Sentosa Island, Native Kitchen takes diners on a culinary adventure with an island-inspired menu featuring the best of land and sea, prepared with a tropical twist. Celebrate the lifestyle of Asian and Polynesian islands with Native Kitchen’s take on a number of culinary favourites, while embracing the culture of togetherness with communal dining options. Special attention is paid to the use of fresh ingredients and culinary techniques that bring out the best of natural flavours, ensuring that the Native Kitchen experience is always enjoyable, welcoming and memorable.

Enjoy the best of Island-inspired cuisine from various islands such as the Maldives, Bali, Hawaii and of course, our very own island nation of Singapore, all under one roof. 

The setting brings to life the Native Kitchen brand. The use of natural materials in the design and choice of tactile furniture complements the islander menu. The vibe is casual yet sophisticated, homely yet contemporary. The use of plants also brings nature in, creating a lush, carefree oasis.

Designed as an expression of nature which revolves around the sea, sky, breeze, sunlight and tropical greens, the overall colour palette was selected to represent a sea-drifting wood at the beach and a tropical atmosphere.Perfect for professional corporate events and casual family gatherings. It is indeed an event space for all.

description:
The Westin Singapore offers a total of 10 meeting rooms,
inclusive of two ballrooms, and over 1,300 square meters of event space for
productivity and focus. The 600 square meters pillar-less Grand Ballroom
accommodates up to 600 guests in a theatre setting. Clear thinking begins with
Westin meetings, helping planners and guests stay focused with spacious, open
rooms, essential amenities and nutritious Bright Breaks curated with guests’
well-being in mind. In addition, we have a variety of adaptable spaces and
unique meeting areas, including Cook & Brew, as well as our Boardroom with
floor-to-ceiling windows boasting natural daylight and stunning views of
Singapore – all designed to inspire the interactive exchange of ideas. To fuel
ideation before, during and after meetings, our Bright Breaks offer meaningful
opportunities to refresh and recharge, whether with an energizing activity or a
beneficial snack. From intuitive tools that help planners book meetings with
ease to a free personalized website where attendees can make reservations and
access documents via a custom URL, we offer a variety of personalized services
designed to ensure a unique and effortless experience. To begin planning your
next Westin event, please visit thewestinsingapore.com/meetings






 Innovate, create and connect at The Westin Singapore with everything you need for a productive session. Choose from eight meeting rooms and two ballrooms for your next meetings with us.

Clear thinking begins with Westin Clutter-Free Meetings, helping planners and guests stay focused with spacious, open rooms, essential amenities and nutritious food from the Eat Well menu curated with guest’s well-being in mind. Streamlined stations offer brainstorming staples such as paper, pens and refreshing beverages. Westin meetings also offer thoughtful "green" features such as energy-efficient light bulbs, double-sided meeting pads and water pitchers in lieu of bottles to help reduce waste.

Whether you’re planning a business meeting, a gala celebration or a soiree, our planners are here to make your gathering effortless. Part of the Marriott family of hotels and resorts, The Westin Singapore offers a variety of intuitive tools to help you book your meetings with ease. Designed with the meeting planner in mind, our personalized services ensure a unique experience each time.
facilities: Air conditioning, Microphone, Private room, Projector, Stage, Wifi, Pens, Papers, Chairs, Tables, Sound System, Tech Support, Event Staff, Tea, Coffee

title: Zafferano Italian Restaurant & Lounge
description: Crowning the Ocean Financial Centre, 43 storeys above bustling Collyer Quay with 270 degrees panoramic view of the Marina Bay skyline conveniently located in the heart of Singapore’s CBD. Zafferano is a perfect venue offering an unforgettable taste of all-round Italian hospitality – beautiful food, impeccable service, enjoyed within a convivial ambience.Zafferano offers two exclusive rooms - the Private Dining Room and the Wine Room. The Private Dining Room boasts a private entrance for discreet access, designed for a luxurious party for up to 22 guests. The Wine Room seats up to 12 guests around a long table, cocooned by racks of wine bottles, offering an elegant, embracing ambience.Set   starting from $52++ up to $128++ per pax (food only)  starting from $98 up to $128++ per pax (food only)Drinks  Starting from $25++ Minimum spends (whole venue):       -   starting from $5,000++       -   starting from $12,000++Other       -  Section of main dining room (up to 50 pax) : starting from $5,000++      -  Terrace exclusive : starting from $3,000++      -  Private dining room (up to 22 pax) : starting from $1,200++                 (applicable for dinner only)

title: O'maJ
description: High quality Western Fusion restaurant with a classic, steakhouse and comfortable decor. AV systems and multiple power points provided.
promos: 10% off total bill for all a la carte items.

title: Giardino Pizza Bar & Grill (Chijmes)
description:
Pizzeria Giardino was established at Chijmes in 2004 and they have recently re-opened a new restaurant in CHIJMES under the name Giardino Pizza Bar & Grill. Giardino! is a casual Italian restaurant, specializing in rustic yet refined Italian food with an authentic flair. They offer classic and artisan pizzas that are hand-crafted and cooked to order in their wood-fired oven, which is visible throughout the restaurant. All their entrees are made from scratch from the highest quality, imported and domestic, ingredients. 

Apart from their amazing tasting food, the ambiance and décor are second to none. This space has a distinct personality that sets a mood for high-energy fun and entertainment. Combining good food with the stunning interior design, Giardino Pizza & Bar is best suited for all sorts of events including proposal, anniversary party, Christmas party, team-bonding and many more!

title: OSG - Our Simple Goodness
description:
OSG-Our Simple Goodness is a multi-cuisine live music bar at Suntec City with a mission of spreading LOVE through Our Simple act of Goodness. This bar gives off a cozy and intimate vibe which is perfect for customers to just kick back and have a fun and relaxing time with friends. 

With delicious food and cozy interior, this awesome bar, cafe, event space is great for get-togethers with friends and family, birthday parties, Christmas parties, happy hour and many more!

title: Al Forno Restaurant
description:
Set up in 1995, Al Forno East Coast is the first Italian restaurant in Singapore to import fresh ingredients like whole peeled tomatoes and cheeses directly from Italy. Complimenting these best ingredients, the Italian pizza-maker bakes with a traditional wood fire oven that gives a splendid taste to the pizzas and fresh bread that you can only find in a true traditional Italian restaurant. 

Perched at the bottom of a shophouse, the unique location of Al Forno gives this venue a homely and cozy vibe to the restaurant which makes it an awesome location for intimate Birthday parties, Christmas parties or just a place to gather with friends and family.

title: BIN 38 @ Tippling Club
description:
BIN 38 - the ultimate experience in private dining. Located on level 2, the exclusive three-part space comprises of Chef-Owner Ryan Clift's state-of-the-art R&D test kitchen, a 34-seater cocktail lounge and an intimate 12-seater dining area – encapsulating the full Tippling Club experience in a private space. Every event at Tippling Club is customized and personalized regardless of size. Here, we have an award winning team (led by Chef Ryan), that can create a menu and experience tailored to our guests’ needs. With one of the most innovative kitchens and best stocked bars in Asia, we take pride in the quality and creativity of each Tippling Club event. The unique venue layout allows us to design one-of-a-kind food and cocktail master classes for you and your guests.

With a standing capacity of up to 60 pax, BIN 38 is the perfect venue for networking, presentations, product launches, VIP registrations, press conferences, birthday/ festive celebrations or a dinner treat to thank your team and clients.

title: Cookyn Inc
description: Cookyn Inc believes in Making Food Fun by fostering interactions amongst people, be it in a social group or a corporate department. More than just a cooking school, we understand that cooking is just part of the fun in working together to create memories that will last for a long time. We also seek to provide wholesome food for your private parties and celebrate special milestones from a full month party to a 60th Birthday bash at our venue.

title: C Side - Coastes, Bikini Bar, Sand Bar & Flame
description:
Located on the tiny island of Sentosa, C Side is the epitome of beach culture and is also the most authentic beach destination in Singapore. C Side is the ultimate escape from the hustle bustle of the city, with a mix of entertainment, activities, parties, food & beverage options, C Side has something for everyone. With panoramic views of the Siloso shoreline, C Side offers a great vantage point to take in glorious sunsets and beautiful displays of fireworks every evening. With an expansive beach and deck space, C Side is a perfect venue for small and large scale events whilst keeping that intimate feel.

The ideal place for corporate functions, dinner and dance, family day, networking events, product launches, birthday parties and weddings, C Side is the most convenient beach getaway in Singapore. With panoramic views of the Siloso shoreline, C Side offers a great vantage point to take in glorious sunsets and beautiful displays of fireworks every evening. With an expansive beach and deck space, C Side is a perfect venue for small and large scale events whilst keeping that intimate feel. At C Side, beach-lovers can truly unwind and enjoy the sun, sand, sea and good food! C Side is a combination of five outlets, each with its own distinct vibe and  Coastes, Sand Bar, Bikini Bar and Flame.Minimum  $50 per person on Weekdays
                                 $88 per person on Weekends 

Prices are subject to GST & Service Charge. For more info or choice of menus, please inquire.

title: Hero's
description:
Hero’s is a sprawling 2,500 sq-ft saloon style venue with a fully-stocked bar, full menu (burgers, kebabs, pizzas, mixed platters and other pub grub) and live band set-up. Our unique VIP area comprises beer-tap tables where patrons can pour their own pints. Hero’s also boasts a spacious main hall as well as a comfortable alfresco area. On Fridays and Saturdays, Circular Road is closed allowing us to add street seating. External catering and events beyond regular opening hours are available upon request.

This huge and spacious event venue is great for accommodating a large number of guests. The flexible space and versatile floor plan are great for hosting a multitude of events such as birthday parties, hen parties, bachelor parties, Christmas parties, etc.

title: Latteria Mozzarella Restaurant
description:
A slice of Southern Italy located just behind Singapore’s bustling CBD area, in the charming Duxton Hill. At Latteria, they offer the freshest Mozzarella and Burrata cheeses as well as an extensive traditional Italian cuisine. Located in a historic shophouse, the cozy indoor restaurant comes with a lush alfresco terrace which provides an idyllic setting - perfect for an unforgettable dining experience in Singapore. 
 
A capacious traditional Italian restaurant that is best to  Birthday, Wedding, Solemnisation, Party, Corporate function, Team Lunch, Networking and the possibilities are countless. The venue comes with food ranging from $45 - $100.Outdoor  2k++ min spend on weekdays (Monday to Thursday)
3k++ min spend on Friday, Saturday and PH's eve.Enquire now for more details.

title: Miska Cafe
description:
With influences from the Mediterranean, Miska Cafe is dedicated to provide a relaxed gathering place for friends and families, with a breathtaking view of the marina. Come and experience an authentic yet modern experience, through a creative Mediterranean menu that combines fresh products, homemade sauces and dressings, a subtle blend of spices and exotic flavours. Complement your meals or chill out evenings with a wide selection of cold draught beer, wines, margaritas, cocktails and specialty drinks that are available from the bar.

Complementing the appetising food is the pretty view of the island. Situated in Sentosa, guests get the front row seat to the gorgeous view of the Sentosa waters. Be it a simple get together with friends and family or a grand party - corporate party, year end party or Christmas party, Miska Cafe will help you host an event that is a night to remember!

10% off event booking for SC staff
- Promotion not available with other deals
- Promo  SCBVRDEAL

10% off event booking for JP Morgan staff
- Promotion is not available with other deals
- Promo  JPMVRDEAL

title: Noti Restaurant & Bar
description:
Brought up in a family of successful restaurateurs in his hometown in the south of Italy, owner and chef Toni Rossetti brings to his very own restaurant – NOTI Restaurant & Bar, a taste of home, tradition and warmth of authentic Italian food from cherished family recipes and the flavors from this bountiful region. In a contemporary interior that exudes a trendy vibe, Toni and his team provide the guests with the consummate dining experience of good food and great hospitality that has become the signature of Noti restaurant and bar.

Located at Club Street, this eye-catching brightly colored yellow shophouse has a modern and trendy interior design. Playing around with red, black and beige colors, this trendy Italian restaurant gives off a luxurious vibe, making it suitable for hosting important business luncheons, dinners or just a simple gathering among friends!
facilities: Organisers have to bring their own video/projector/screen/audio equipment for multimedia presentation

title: SingaporeBowling @ Rifle Range
description:
Nestled within Bukit Timah Nature Reserve, SingaporeBowling@ Rifle Range is the biggest bowling in Singapore with 38 lanes in a single centre. It is also a flexible and unique venue that is suitable for all types of events as far as your imagination stretches. With 3,490 sqm, you can be assured of ample space and well maintained equipment to make your event a successful one. From Team-Bonding to Corporate  Product Launches, CSR or Theme Parties, we've done it all. 

For added convenience, lane assignments, scores tabulations, catering menus and shuttle bus options (external vendors) are available. There is also no surcharges should you decided to bring your own.

title: Talay Thai
description:
Talay Thai serves authentic Thai food with an urban twist – it’s a modern, warm and avant-garde “drinking hole” where suits and food collide. 

Talay Thai is set to make waves as the newest Thai tapas concept in Singapore situated at the hottest wine and dine precinct – Clarke Quay. The interior décor exudes a resounding punch of personality; the orchestrated harmony of the rustic deep red floors, electric fish scale feature walls and ornate traditional Thai displays is a sight to behold and drinking hole worth a go.

With an extensive menu of over 50 items, Talay Thai will leave you spoilt for choices. From more than 20 variety of tapas bites to unique Thai cocktail concoctions, enjoy the authentic Thai experience and take your taste buds on a flavour explosion. 

Host your event at our restaurant and enjoy our delicious authentic Thai cuisines. Perfect for corporate event, networking, client dinners and birthday parties.

title: The Monarchy Cocktail Bar & Ultra-Lounge
description:
The Monarchy at 56 / 58 Tras Street is a Quintessentially British Cocktail Bar & Ultra Lounge serving timeless cocktails through the ages. Set in a stunning heritage shophouse, the chic venue is spread over 3,600 square feet on the ground floor in the heart of the CBD.

The welcome entrance features an elegant cocktail bar, which exudes understated luxury and bears a distinctly regal theme. Comprising an 8 metre long bar with a variety of comfortable low table seating, intimate booth seating and social high tables it's the perfect space for an early evening cocktail reception. 

The Monarchy’s second space, interconnected to the cocktail bar, is the dazzling ultra lounge featuring a Royal Jesters themed bar, a state of the art and 'British Made' Funktion One sound system as well as a striking DJ console. The dimly lit and cosy boudoir is lined by 7 leather Chesterfields named after British Icons through the ages and is ideal for a standing cocktail event, product launches, private gatherings, buffet lines with catered live stations or for dancing the night away.

Both the cocktail bar and ultra lounge venues are available for hire either separately behind closed doors or combined with a total capacity of 160 pax.

title: White Sails Yacht - StarGazer
description:
White Sails Yacht is a luxury yacht company that has always kept their yacht in showroom condition. White Sails Yacht represents the most reputable, first class, full-service yacht in Singapore and their yacht has been carefully selected to meet the exceptionally high standards by the company. Being dedicated to providing their guests only the best and highest quality choices possible, guests will not be disappointed to the type of yacht available for booking. 

The StarGazer is one of the luxury yachts with full facilities onboard. This yacht comes with a comfortable seating area, a kitchen and a spacious bed. This yacht is truly a home on the waters and is perfect for hosting events such as anniversaries, proposal, birthday parties and even office parties.

This has enabled 80RR to tap on their expertise and wealth of experience to provide members with the most comfortable work space and experience.  Customise the event space to your desired layout and setting for your events. Currently, 80RR is home to more than 50 companies from diverse countries and background.  Our Mission is to provide an affordable coworking space and event space within the Central Business District (CBD), which is essential for collaboration and networking for industry players in the Fintech Eco-system. ​With over 50 years of experience, HLHL is a major player in the property market. This has enabled 80RR to tap on their expertise and wealth of experience to provide members with the most comfortable work space and experience.  Available for rental at an hourly rate, our conference rooms are perfect for company wide meetings or hosting business partners in a professional setting. Fully equipped to provide you with the most satisfactory meeting environment.
facilities: Air conditioning, Private room, Wifi, Chairs, Tables, TV Screen, Tech Support, Tea, Coffee, Cleaner

title: Amethyst
description:
The Amethyst was developed to set a new standard as the state-of-the-art, pure-bred Aquila 48 Power Catamaran1 with a perfect balance between luxurious comfort and performance. The main deck offers extended spaces for living large, with beautiful panoramic views and access to both forward and aft covered cockpit seating areas. Inside, comfortable saloon seating ensures leisurely dining and entertainment. The galley is ergonomically designed with the most modern of appliances, and all the cabins are well-lit thanks to their panoramic windows and offer spacious en-suite bathrooms and showers stalls.

Pleasing modern lines set the Amethyst in a league of her own and moving around this boat is a breeze for all. Access to the flybridge from one of five convenient stairways – the interior salon, or the innovative forward and aft secure stairways. A large entertainment and dining area on the flybridge with barbecue with wet bar. On the main deck, outside shaded areas in the front and rear ensure leisurely relaxation on every level. Everywhere you look on board the Amethyst, you will find quality without compromise. So plan your next team-bonding, birthday, Christmas party on board this majestic yacht and have a whale of a time.

title: Baja Fresh Mexican Grill - Event Space
description:
Nestled in the heart of the city, Baja Fresh Mexican Grill offers two event spaces for your perfect Mexican fiesta. Party with probably the best Mexican cuisine in town with pitchers of frozen margaritas, sangrias and draft beer. Our first space is a chic location at The Sail, right in the middle of CBD. Our second spot is at Baja Fresh Mexican Grill at Rendezvous Hotel.

An exciting place for taco, burritos and margaritas lover, it is the perfect location for office parties and weekend parties, birthdays, cocktail parties, happy hour and even baby showers.
